ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Wind Magnetic Field Investigation (MFI) 15-sec magnetic field data, solar wind only

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated to SPASE Version 2.3.2 if needed, Applied quality control for DOI usage, LFB

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Data consist of 15-sec averages of magnetic field magnitude and GSE Cartesian components, from the MFI magnetometer on Wind. Data are for only the solar wind phases of the Wind orbit.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Principal Investigator A. Koval, UMBC, NASA/GSFC, and J. King and N. Papitashvili, NASA/GSFC/SPDF, data set producers.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Koval, Andriy; Szabo, Adam; & Papitashvili, Natalia E.

Parameter.Name: Time
Parameter.Description: Universal time at start of average

Structure.Description: Year, day-of-year, hour, minute, second at start of average

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Description: GSE Cartesian components of magnetic field vector

Structure.Description: GSE Cartesian components in X,Y,Z sequence
